_comments.strip_step_prefix: Used for algorithm generation from markdown. If true, looks for counts in markdown files like 'Step 1:', 'Step 2:', etc., and removes the 'Step X:' prefix when generating new lines in the LaTeX document. If false, treats each new line in the markdown file as a separate step.

regex.expit_dir_enum_prefix: This regex is used to identify and remove the enumeration prefix (like Q1_, Q2_, etc.) from experiment directory names when generating section titles in the LaTeX document.
